message: Let's make a deal! I take $70, you get $30. This way we both leave with something.
I'm proposing a fairer split. You get $45, I get $55.  This way we both have a good share, and we can end this quickly.
Bob, time is money!  I'll come down a bit to $65, you get $35. Let's wrap this up before inflation eats away at your share even more.
This is my final offer. I'm willing to give you $40. If we don't settle now, we'll both end up with less due to inflation.  Let's be reasonable.
